blogPost.excerpt: https://burnrate.fyi is a SaaS expense estimator designed with ease-of-use in mind. In three easy steps you can choose the products or services you want, configure them, and see your expected burnrate at the end of each month.
blogPost.body: https://burnrate.fyi is a SaaS expense estimator designed with ease-of-use in mind. In three easy steps you can choose the products or services you want, configure them, and see your expected burnrate at the end of each month.
blogPost.title: burnrate.fyi - Estimate your SaaS expenses in 5 minutes for free
blogPost.author: Andrew Hariri

localize.description: https://burnrate.fyi 是一款SaaS费用估算器，设计时考虑到了易用性。在三个简单的步骤中，你可以选择你想要的产品或服务，配置它们，并在每个月末看到你的预期燃烧率。
https://burnrate.fyi 是一款SaaS費用估算器，設計時考慮到了易用性。在三個簡單的步驟中，你可以選擇你想要的產品或服務，配置它們，並在每個月末看到你的預期燃燒率。

previous.excerpt: Premast Plus helps 10k users design presentations using PowerPoint and now we are looking forward to enabling them & more people to manage, share and create branded content with our new stunning features. A plugin and web app that gives you the ultimate access
previous.title: Premast Plus 2.0 - Design professionally branded Powerpoint presentations

localize.description: Premast Plus帮助1万名用户使用PowerPoint设计演示文稿，现在我们期待通过我们的新功能让他们和更多人能够管理、分享和创建品牌内容。一款插件和网络应用，让你能够最终访问。
localize.tagline: 设计专业品牌的Powerpoint演示文稿

localize.description: Premast Plus幫助1萬名用戶使用PowerPoint設計演示文稿，現在我們期待通過我們的新功能讓他們和更多人能夠管理、分享和創建品牌內容。一款插件和網絡應用，讓你能夠最終訪問。
localize.tagline: 設計專業品牌的Powerpoint演示文稿
